verbs.description: [ARG1: asparagus] [V: wraps] [ARG1: asparagus] makes lovely finger food especially wrapped in pastry and tasty filling easily assembled it perfect for weeknight noshing or something a little fancier for entertaining —linda hall evington virginia asparagus
